snippet: The satirical newspaper, the target of an attack in 2015 that killed top editors and cartoonists, has started a German edition that features Angela Merkel on its first cover....
lead_paragraph: The satirical newspaper, the target of an attack in 2015 that killed top editors and cartoonists, has started a German edition that features Angela Merkel on its first cover.

headline.main: Charlie Hebdo, a Lightning Rod in France, Hits German Newsstands
headline.print_headline: With a German Edition, Charlie Hebdo Forges On
